tools.name: list_folders
tools.description:
Lists all available Outlook mail folders.

    Returns:
        A JSON-formatted string containing a list of folder names.

    Example:
        list_folders()

tools.name: list_recent_emails
tools.description:
Retrieves a list of email subject lines from a specified folder within a given number of days.

    Args:
        days: Number of days to look back for recent emails (must be non-negative).
        folder: Name of the folder to search in (optional; defaults to the inbox).

    Returns:
        A JSON-formatted string containing a list of email subject lines.

    Example:
        list_recent_emails(days=7, folder="Inbox")

tools.name: search_emails
tools.description:
Searches for emails based on keywords or contact names within a specified time range and folder.

    Args:
        keyword: Keyword to search for in the email body or subject.
        contact: Contact name or email address to filter results.
        start_date: Start date for the search range (format: `YYYY-MM-DD`).
        end_date: End date for the search range (format: `YYYY-MM-DD`).
        folder: Name of the folder to search in (optional; defaults to the inbox).

    Returns:
        A JSON-formatted string containing a list of matching email subject lines.

    Example:
        search_emails(keyword="urgent", contact="john.doe@example.com", start_date="2023-01-01", end_date="2023-01-31", folder="Inbox")

tools.name: get_email_by_number
tools.description:
Retrieves detailed information (body and attachments) for a specific email from the last listed set of emails.

    Args:
        email_number: Index of the email in the last listed set of emails.

    Returns:
        A JSON-formatted string containing the email's body, subject, and attachment details.

    Example:
        get_email_by_number(email_number=5)

tools.name: reply_to_email_by_number
tools.description:
Sends a reply to a specific email from the last listed set of emails.

    Args:
        email_number: Index of the email in the last listed set of emails.
        reply_content: Content of the reply message.

    Returns:
        A string indicating success or failure of the operation.

    Example:
        reply_to_email_by_number(email_number=5, reply_content="Thank you for your email. I will review it shortly.")

tools.name: compose_email
tools.description:
Creates and sends a new email with specified recipients, subject, body, and optional attachments.

    Args:
        to: Comma-separated list of recipient email addresses.
        cc: Comma-separated list of CC recipient email addresses (optional).
        subject: Subject of the email.
        body: Body content of the email.
        attachments: List of file paths to attach (optional).

    Returns:
        A string indicating success or failure of the operation.

    Example:
        compose_email(
            to="recipient@example.com",
            cc="cc_recipient@example.com",
            subject="Meeting Reminder",
            body="Please remember to attend the meeting tomorrow at 10 AM.",
            attachments=["path/to/file1.pdf", "path/to/file2.docx"]
        )

search_emails.purpose: 验证 search_emails 能同时使用 keyword 和 contact 参数进行组合搜索。

search_emails.case_name: Search Emails With Invalid Date Format
search_emails.purpose: 验证当提供错误格式的日期时，search_emails 是否返回参数错误。

response.result: {"error": "Date format error: time data '01-01-2023' does not match format '%Y-%m-%d'"}

search_emails.purpose: 验证当指定的文件夹不存在时，工具是否优雅处理并返回空结果或错误信息。

search_emails.case_name: Search Emails With Special Characters In Keyword
search_emails.purpose: 验证 search_emails 是否能正确处理包含特殊字符的关键词搜索。

get_email_by_number.purpose: 验证使用有效的邮件索引号可以成功检索邮件正文和附件信息。
验证当邮件索引为0时，是否能正确检索第一封邮件。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Retrieve Email With Invalid Negative Index
get_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当邮件索引为负数时，工具是否返回参数错误。
验证当邮件索引超出已列出邮件数量时，是否返回错误或空结果。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Retrieve Email With Large Index Value
get_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当邮件索引值非常大时，工具是否能正确处理边界情况。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Retrieve Email With Special Characters In Attachment Names
get_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当邮件附件名称包含特殊字符时，get_email_by_number 是否能正确返回JSON格式数据。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Retrieve Email Without Listing Emails First
get_email_by_number.purpose: 验证在未调用 list_recent_emails 列出邮件的情况下直接调用 get_email_by_number 是否能正确处理错误。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Retrieve Email With Corrupted Email Data
get_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当邮件数据损坏或无法读取时，get_email_by_number 是否能返回可读的错误信息。

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To Email By Number - Basic Functionality
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证 reply_to_email_by_number 工具能够成功向最近列出的邮件中的指定编号邮件发送回复。

args.reply_content: This is a test reply to the selected email.

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To Email With Invalid Email Number
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当提供的 email_number 超出最近列出邮件数量范围时，工具是否返回错误信息。

args.reply_content: This should not be sent due to invalid email number.

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To Email With Negative Email Number
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当 email_number 为负数时，工具是否拒绝执行并返回参数错误。

args.reply_content: Negative email number should not be allowed.

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To Email Without Any Emails Listed
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证在未列出任何邮件的情况下尝试回复时，工具是否能优雅地处理错误。

args.reply_content: No emails available to reply to.

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To Email With Empty Reply Content
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当 reply_content 为空字符串时，工具是否仍能正常发送空回复。

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To Email With Special Characters In Content
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证 reply_to_email_by_number 是否能正确处理包含特殊字符（如!@#$%^&*）的回复内容。

args.reply_content: This is a test with special characters: !@#$%^&*()

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To Email With Maximum Index
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当 email_number 设置为最大可能值（例如：7）时，工具是否能正确发送回复。

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To Email With Minimum Index
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当 email_number 设置为最小有效值（例如：0）时，工具是否能正确发送回复。

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With Minimal Required Parameters
compose_email.purpose: 验证 compose_email 在仅提供必填参数 'to' 的情况下能否成功发送邮件。

args.subject: Test Subject
args.body: This is a test email body.

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With CC And Body
compose_email.purpose: 验证 compose_email 能够正确处理包含 'cc' 参数的邮件发送，并验证邮件内容是否完整。

args.subject: Meeting Reminder
args.body: Please remember to attend the meeting tomorrow at 10 AM.

compose_email.purpose: 验证 compose_email 能正确附加一个文件并发送邮件。
验证 compose_email 支持多个附件，且所有附件都能正确附加。

args.subject: Multiple Files Attached
args.body: Here are the files you requested.

compose_email.purpose: 验证 compose_email 能接受空正文内容并正常发送邮件。

compose_email.case_name: Send Email To Invalid Email Address
compose_email.purpose: 验证 compose_email 对无效邮箱地址进行有效错误处理。

args.subject: Invalid Recipient
args.body: This email should not be sent.

compose_email.purpose: 验证 compose_email 在指定附件路径不存在时能优雅地返回错误信息。

args.subject: Nonexistent File Attachment
args.body: Trying to attach a file that does not exist.

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With Special Characters In Subject
compose_email.purpose: 验证 compose_email 是否能正确处理包含特殊字符的主题行。
